Trailer Mounted Options

Available in both Super-Silenced and Ultra-Quiet ranges, our towable generators offer another solution for site power.

Overview

Our towable generators range from 20 to 100 kVA and provide the ideal solution for a number of different applications.

  • They offer ease of mobility to suit the ever-changing demand of the modern-day site, allowing clients to easily re-position as required.
  • They allow our clients to get power to even the most remote location. For sites with tight access, unsuitable for HGV delivery, delivery can be made by 4×4 vehicle.
  • Fast response and quick despatch requirements.

All of our generators in this range are mounted on high quality galvanised trailers, suitable for transportation on road. See our individual generator pages for technical specifications.
